name: certificate-ssl-uhttpd-crt
notes: Certificate Type: X.509 SSL/TLS Certificate. Includes router login domain (routerlogin.net).

name: analysis-limitation-usr-bin
description: Due to security restrictions, a comprehensive scan for hardcoded credentials in the /usr/bin directory cannot be performed in the current environment. Recommended alternatives: 1) Re-analyze in an unrestricted environment 2) Manually inspect critical binaries 3) Perform offline analysis using static analysis tools.
notes: Critical binary files such as transmission-daemon and openssl are common locations for storing sensitive information and should be prioritized for inspection.

name: rpc-auth-config
notes: Check if the settings.json configuration file contains hardcoded credentials

name: upnp-port-forwarding
description: Discovered UPnP/NAT-PMP port forwarding related strings, potentially exposing network configuration information

name: dht-network-info
description: Identified DHT network-related identifiers, containing potential P2P network node information

name: missing-transmission-config
description: The configuration file for the target Transmission daemon does not exist in the firmware filesystem. Inspection revealed that the REDACTED_PASSWORD_PLACEHOLDER directory is empty, and the .config subdirectory is also absent.
notes: Possible causes: 1) Incorrect path 2) Firmware does not include Transmission daemon 3) Configuration file is stored in another location

name: ssl-config-reference
description: Found SSL certificate path configuration in uhttpd.sh
notes: The certificate file path points to the /etc/ directory, and it is necessary to confirm whether these files contain sensitive information.

name: wifi-psk-update
description: Directly manipulating UCI configuration to set WiFi PSK keys indicates that the system may modify wireless network keys under certain circumstances.
notes: Verify the source and generation method of the psk variable.

name: REDACTED_SENSITIVE_DATA
notes: It is recommended to check all instances where kh_key_hex is used and replace them with randomly generated values.

name: tmp-directory-scan
description: A comprehensive scan of all files in the /tmp directory has been completed, with no hardcoded credentials or sensitive information detected.
notes: The files examined include: firmware_region, lang_status, multi_lang/languages_nonEnglish.js, net-cgi.conf
